details.temperature:
Very Hot (creatures must succeed on a Fortitude saving throw each
    hour (DC 15, +1 per previous check) or take 1d4 points of
    non-lethal damage; creatures wearing heavy clothing or any type of
    armor take a -4 penalty on their saves; a creature that takes any
    non-lethal damage from heat exposure suffers from heatstroke and is
    fatigued)

detail.room_features: A narrow shaft descends from the room into a natural cavern below, and clouds of flying insects fill the east side of the room
